mapper.select: /*패스워드 체크*/ SELECT member_pw FROM member WHERE member_pw = #{memberPw};

/*기부 상품 사용처 등록 심사,승인*/ SELECT a.donation_apply_num ,m.member_id ,a.donation_apply_date ,a.donation_apply_info ,a.donation_apply_completion ,a.donation_license_state ,a.donation_license_num FROM tb_donation_recipient_apply AS a INNER JOIN member AS m on a.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX('donation_apply_num','_',-1) AS UNSIGNED) ASC;

/*기부 상품 사용처*/ SELECT e.donation_center_num ,a.donation_apply_num ,m.member_id ,e.donation_recipient_name ,e.donation_introduction ,e.donation_recipient_phone ,e.donation_recipient_email ,e.donation_recipient_addr FROM tb_donation_recipient_info AS e INNER JOIN tb_donation_recipient_apply AS a ON e.donation_apply_num = a.donation_apply_num INNER JOIN member AS m ON e.member_id = m.member_id ;
